title: Everton sack Benitez | Rooney, Lampard on shortlist

title: Cheltenham 'saddened' by homophobic abuse in Charlton game
shortDescription: Cheltenham Town say they are "saddened" by reports of alleged homophobic abuse during Saturday's League One draw with Charlton Athletic.

title: Euro: Sevilla vs Real Betis abandoned as player hit by 20-inch pole
shortDescription: The Copa del Rey derby match between Real Betis and Sevilla was suspended after a pole hurled from the stands hit Sevilla player Joan Jordan in the head on Saturday.
